import React from 'react'; import { AutoLinkHeader, Example, Link as PatternflyThemeLink } from 'theme-patternfly-org/components'; const pageData = { "id": "Notification drawer", "section": "components", "source": "html", "slug": "/components/notification-drawer/html", "sourceLink": "https://github.com/patternfly/patternfly/blob/main/packages/docs/src/patternfly/components/NotificationDrawer/examples/NotificationDrawer.md", "beta": true, "cssPrefix": [ "pf-c-notification-drawer" ], "examples": [ "Basic", "Groups" ] }; pageData.examples = { 'Basic': props =>
